Package main

Class GameEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.GameEnvironment
  • public class GameEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class that implements the logic of the game and stores game attributes
    Author:
    Leoca

      java.lang.String applyMedicine​(main.MedicalItems medicine, main.CrewMembers appliedMember)
      Determines what medical item is being used and then uses the item, and thus removes it from the crews medical items list Using the medical item also decreases the crew members actions remaining

      Calculates the damage the ship takes from the asteroid and applys the damage to the ships shield

      calls the closeWindow method on end screen which closes the window

      calls the closeWindow method on outpostScreen which closes the window It then launches the ship option screen
      void closeSetupScreen​(main.SetupScreen setupWindow)
      closes a Setup screen called setupWindow and calls the method launchShipOptionsScreen and creates a new Ship options window and launches it

      closes a ShipMenuScreen shipOptionsScreen

      main function that instantiates GameEnironment and launches the setup screen
      void newDayChanges()
      All the daily changes to each crew members stats, current days are increased and remaining days are decreased
      java.lang.String newDayEvent()
      Creates a random chance for a event to occur, resulting in different changes to the crew members inventory and possible infections of space plague
      boolean newPlanet​(main.CrewMembers member1, main.CrewMembers member2)
      Travels crew to new planet, decreasing the 2 pilots actions by 1 each, and initializes the parts found planet to false.
      boolean purchaseFood​(main.FoodItems item, int quantity)
      Calls method getAmountMoney to see if crew member has enough money in which case a food item/s are added to the crews food items list otherwise the funds are insufficient and the purchase is not made
      boolean purchaseMedicine​(main.MedicalItems item, int quantity)
      If the ship and crew have sufficient funds to purchase medical items then the item/s are added to the crews medicine list and their amount of money is reduced
      java.lang.String removeActionsTooHungry()
      Decreases crew members daily actions by 1 such that the crew member has 100 Hunger level
      java.lang.String removeActionsTooTired()
      Decreases crew members daily actions by 1 such that the crew member has 100 tiredness level
      java.lang.String removeDeadCrewMembers()
      Removes a crew member if the crew member dies, i.e the crew members Health level less than 0

      Removes food from crew members food list

      • purchaseFood

        public boolean purchaseFood​(main.FoodItems item,
                            int quantity)
        Calls method getAmountMoney to see if crew member has enough money in which case a food item/s are added to the crews food items list otherwise the funds are insufficient and the purchase is not made
        Parameters:
        item - FoodItems, the particular food item
        quantity - int, the quantity of food items
        Returns:
        boolean, true or false, depending on whether purchase is made

      • feed

        public boolean feed​(main.FoodItems food,
                    main.CrewMembers appliedMember)
        Determines what food is selected and adjusts the hunger levels of the crew member relative to the particular food items how much the item reduces their hunger level
        Parameters:
        food - String, which particular food
        appliedMember - , String, the current member playing
        Returns:
        boolean, true or false depending if hunger levels are 0 or not 0

      • removeFood

        public void removeFood​(main.FoodItems removeFood)
        Removes food from crew members food list
        Parameters:
        removeFood - FoodItems, food being removed

      • purchaseMedicine

        public boolean purchaseMedicine​(main.MedicalItems item,
                                int quantity)
        If the ship and crew have sufficient funds to purchase medical items then the item/s are added to the crews medicine list and their amount of money is reduced
        Parameters:
        item - String, the particular medical item
        quantity - int, the quantity of selected item
        Returns:
        boolean, True or false depending if the crew has sufficient funds

      • applyMedicine

        public java.lang.String applyMedicine​(main.MedicalItems medicine,
                                      main.CrewMembers appliedMember)
        Determines what medical item is being used and then uses the item, and thus removes it from the crews medical items list Using the medical item also decreases the crew members actions remaining
        Parameters:
        medicine - MedicalItems, the particular medical item
        appliedMember - The particular member to which the item is being used on
        Returns:
        tells player that a item is used if the item can be used, else prompts the player with a error

      • removeMedicine

        public void removeMedicine​(main.MedicalItems removeMed)
        removes medicine from crews medical item list
        Parameters:
        removeMed - MedicalItems, the medical item being removed

        public java.lang.String searchForParts​(main.CrewMembers member)
        Initiates a member to search for parts, random chance event occurs
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        item that is found when search or a prompt saying that the crew member has no actions remaining

      • newDayEvent

        public java.lang.String newDayEvent()

        Returns:
        the random event that occurs

      • newDayChanges

      • removeActionsTooTired

        public java.lang.String removeActionsTooTired()
        Decreases crew members daily actions by 1 such that the crew member has 100 tiredness level
        Returns:
        prompt letting player know crew member has less actions

      • removeActionsTooHungry

        public java.lang.String removeActionsTooHungry()
        Decreases crew members daily actions by 1 such that the crew member has 100 Hunger level
        Returns:
        prompts letting player know crew member has less actions

      • removeDeadCrewMembers

        public java.lang.String removeDeadCrewMembers()
        Removes a crew member if the crew member dies, i.e the crew members Health level less than 0
        Returns:
        prompt alerting player that the crew member has died and removed from the crew

      • newPlanet

        public boolean newPlanet​(main.CrewMembers member1,
                         main.CrewMembers member2)
        Travels crew to new planet, decreasing the 2 pilots actions by 1 each, and initializes the parts found planet to false. Also creates a random chance for ship damage to occur
        Parameters:
        member1 - one of the crew members
        member2 - one of the crew members
        Returns:
        boolean, true or false depending on whether or not asteroid damage occurs

      • asteroidBeltDamage

        public void asteroidBeltDamage()
        Calculates the damage the ship takes from the asteroid and applys the damage to the ships shield

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a prompt as to what action has occurred

        public java.lang.String haveMemberSleep​(main.CrewMembers member)
        implements the sleep option
        Parameters:
        member - a specific crew member
        Returns:
        a prompt to the player depending on the tiredness level and the actions remaining

      • foundPartOnPlanetYesNo

        public java.lang.String foundPartOnPlanetYesNo()
        Determines if part is found on planet
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        status of either Infected, or No infection
